entry.title: Sunday night: Rain. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Rain ending late this evening then cloudy. Fog patches developing before morning. Wind south 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 early this evening then light near midnight. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Sunday 9 April 2023
